item.title: Go versions, how to make updates easier
item.description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software. Because of its rapid development, there is an issue with version updates. It requires not only download and compile new version, but also update $GOROOT and $GOPATH environment variables. One way to simplify this process is to use version manager, such as gvm. Installations process is super easy: bash < <(curl -s -S -L https://raw.
